Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. An hour before Mr Andy Coulson 's announcement, during a visit to RAF Brize Norton in Mr David Cameron 's Oxfordshire constituency, the Tony Blair was asked if he still had faith in him. He said: You know what I have said about this in the past. I have got nothing to add to that and I think he's done a very good job for the Government.
